learning_outcomes.description: Describe and explain the principles behind the geometric and pavement design of highway infrastructure
Identify the primary factors to be considered in the design and construction of highway infrastructure
Identify highway infrastructure problems and create practical and innovative design solutions
Understand the social and environmental responsibilities in highway design and construction
Create highway design solutions that are sensitive to local context and conditions
Use standard industry software to generate highway designs and documentation
Report and present design choices, and articulate design tradeoffs and decisions, to the public

assessments.task_description: There are four sections in this sequence, each is worth 15%. This assessment task evaluates students' abilities, skills and knowledge without the aid of generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) or Machine Translation (MT). Students are advised that the use of AI or MT technologies to develop responses is strictly prohibited and may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Electronic submission of report and any design files must be through the course BlackBoard site.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
The final exam will include a combination of short answer, short essay and problem solving questions.

This assessment task evaluates students' abilities, skills and knowledge without the aid of generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) or Machine Translation (MT). Students are advised that the use of AI or MT technologies to develop responses is strictly prohibited and may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to defer this exam.
